topic.title: Internal error: TypeError: actionBigfileUploadInit() takes 4 positional arguments but 5 were given UiWebsocket.py line 79 > UiWebsocket.py line 232 > MergerSite/MergerSitePlugin.py line 177 > MergerSite/MergerSitePlugin.py line 147
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.7.1
  * Operating system: Win10
  * Web browser: Chrome
  * Tor status: not available/always/disabled
  * Opened port: yes/no no
  * Special configuration: no

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
Can't download all files as an archive anymore
#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. Seed a file
  2. then select "Download all files of this post as an archive" and get the error


#### Observed Results:

  * What happened? This could be a screenshot, a description, log output (you can send log/debug.log file to hello@zeronet.io if necessary), etc.

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?
That I can download the files
